text:
When DBTags is used (of the package JSTL) to do a consultation, if this doesn't 
have registrations the code it is come back complete SQL
creator: fernando.anselmo@oab.org.br
yannc76@yahoo.de
text:
I'm not quite sure if you're referring to the SQL-tags of the JSTL or the 
DBTags of the Jakarta-Taglibs project, but IMHO this bug report seems rather 
related to either one of the taglibs than Tomcat. Which one are you using and 
what exactly is the source code/error log you're getting?
Marking as invalid unless original reporter can give more needed information.
creator: yannc76@yahoo.de
